name: Luca Cosivi
description: Luca leads Ecosystem Development at OpenZeppelin, focusing on expanding OpenZeppelin Contracts for Solidity and new execution environments. His first job, while at university, was with companies building on Ethereum. Passionate about the Ethereum community, Luca was part of the organizing team for the first Devconnect in Amsterdam. He now organizes Latin Americaâ€™s largest Ethereum hackathons as a Co-Founder of ETHSamba and founded Bamba, a physical hub for crypto projects in Rio de Janeiro.
